Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Bartender Trousers
Pantalon noir et gris de barman du Scorpio's de Sodium
Schwarz und graue Sodium-Scorpio's Barkeeper-Hosen
Pantaloni da barista dello Scorpio's di Sodium neri e grigi
Pantalones de camarero negros y grises de Scorpio’s en Sodium
Scorpio'sバーテンダーパンツ(ブラック)
Sodium Scorpio's 흑/회색 바텐더 긴바지(남성)
Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Bartender Trousers (Men)
Sodium Scorpio's 灰黑色調酒師長褲（男用）

Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Bartender Trousers
kDesc
Wear this item with the Black and Grey Bartender Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
Portez ce pantalon avec la chemise noire et grise de barman pour servir au bar Scorpio’s afin de gagner des crédits Sodium. [#Legal]
Trage diesen Artikel mit dem schwarz und grauen Barkeeper-Hemd, wenn du in Scorpio's Bar arbeitest, um Sodium-Credits zu verdienen. [#Legal]
Indossa questo articolo insieme alla camicia da barista nera e grigia mentre lavori al Bar Scorpio's per guadagnare Crediti Sodium. [#Legal]
Combínalos con la camisa de camarero negra y gris mientras trabajas en Scorpio's para conseguir créditos Sodium. [#Legal]
Scorpio's のバーで働いて Sodiumクレジットを稼ぐ際、このアイテムを着用しよう。 [#Legal]
이 셔츠를 흑/회색 바텐더 셔츠와 함께 입고 Scorpio's 바에서 일하면 Sodium 포인트를 적립할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Wear this item with the Black and Grey Bartender Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服及灰黑色調酒師襯衫，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服及灰黑色調酒師襯衫，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
Wear this item with the Black and Grey Bartender Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
